Title: CryptoNews
Description: Develop a web app that fetches and categorizes cryptocurrency news articles and proposes a price impact rate for each news article

Title: ConnectNews
Description: As a user I want the app to connect to a cryptocurrency news website or API so that I can receive the latest news updates

Title: CryptoNews
Description: Research and select the best cryptocurrency news website or API to connect to

Title: Connect
Description: Set up a connection to the selected cryptocurrency news website or API

Title: fetchNews
Description: Implement a function to fetch the latest news updates from the website or API

Title: Model
Description: Create a data model to represent the news articles including fields for cryptocurrency price impact and other relevant information

Title: Categorize Crypto
Description: Implement a function to categorize each news article based on the cryptocurrency it is related to

Title: RateNews
Description: Implement a function to propose a price impact rate for each news article

Title: DB Setup
Description: Set up a database to store the news articles

Title: StoreNews
Description: Implement a function to store the categorized and rated news articles in the database

Title: NewsTable
Description: Design and create a simple web app interface to display the news articles in a table

Title: Fetch News
Description: Implement a function to fetch the news articles from the database and display them in the web app

Title: Connect
Description: Test the app to ensure that it successfully connects to the cryptocurrency news website or API and displays the latest news updates in the web app

Title: Optimize
Description: Refine and optimize the apps performance if necessary

Title: Document
Description: Document the apps functionality and provide instructions for deployment and usage

Title: Test
Description: Conduct user testing to gather feedback and make any necessary improvements to the app

Title: Deploy
Description: Deploy the app to a production environment for public use

Description: Implement a mechanism to continuously fetch and categorize new incoming news articles in realtime

Description: Add functionality to allow users to search and filter news articles based on specific cryptocurrencies

Description: Implement user authentication and authorization to ensure only authorized users can access the web app and its features

Description: Implement a mechanism to periodically update the cryptocurrency list and their corresponding categories in the app

Description: Test the app thoroughly to ensure proper functionality and accuracy of categorization and sentiment analysis

Title: Monitor
Description: Monitor and maintain the app to ensure its continuous operation and performance optimization
